response.overview: Embodied Architecture is an immersive film focusing on the monumental pagodas of the Liao dynasty (916–1125). The project centers upon a question: what is the logic and language of design that fundamentally informs Chinese architecture? Based on in-depth research and cutting-edge digital technology, this project manifests in two theatrical forms—an immersive film and an online theater—that invite modern visitors to step into the space, culture, and imagination of Buddhist architecture.
response.title: Embodied Architecture
